name: Supernatural Senses
prereq: Acute Scent Or Precise Or Imprecise Scent
summary: Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised.
description:
Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised. When you target a concealed or hidden opponent while you are raging, you reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or to 9 for a hidden one.Traits

Rage: You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
